column5: Welcome to my home for Super Bowl 51! Very large one bedroom apartment with a fully equipped full size kitchen, laundry room and a large bathroom. PET FRIENDLY! The bedroom is equipped with brand new pillow top mattresses; one is a queen and one is a twin daybed. The bedroom has plenty of space for a portable crib. I also have a queen size air mattress that can sleep two. I have plenty of extra pillows and blankets! Also, there is a lot of free visitor parking around my building!
